title: Glorious Vegetable and Cashew Stir-fry Rice
ingredients: ['250g basmati rice, rinsed', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '1 tbsp dry sherry', '2 tsp toasted sesame oil', '2 tbsp vegetable oil', '225g carrots, peeled, halved lengthways and thinly sliced', '300g leeks, thinly sliced', '150g Savoy cabbage, thinly sliced', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '1 large fresh red chilli, seeded and sliced, or 1/2 tsp crushed chilli flakes', '75g cashew nuts', '75g mixed toasted seeds']
